# springLoadingHighlight

**Instance Property**

A highlighting style for your app’s user interface to display during a spring-loading operation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var springLoadingHighlight: NSSpringLoadingHighlight { get }
```

## Discussion

During a spring-loaded operation, a destination may initiate animated highlighting to visually cue the user that spring-loading has been engaged or disengaged.

This property contains a highlight style of class [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpringLoadingHighlight]—no highlight, standard highlight, or emphasized highlight. Use this value to update your destination’s user interface accordingly to reflect the appropriate highlight style.



## Related Documentation

- **springLoadingHighlightChanged(_:)**: Updates the destination’s user interface to display a new highlighting style during a spring-loading operation.
- **NSSpringLoadingHighlight**: A group of constants that indicate a highlighting style for your app’s user interface to display during a spring-loading operation.
- **NSSpringLoadingDestination**: A set of methods that the destination object (or recipient) of a dragged object can implement to support spring-loading.

## Implementing spring-loading support

- **resetSpringLoading()**: Resets a spring-loading operation to its initial state.
